<a id="Shader"></a>

# Shader

**Inherits:** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [VisualShader](VisualShader.md)

A shader implemented in the Redot shading language.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A custom shader program implemented in the Redot shading language, saved with the ``.gdshader`` extension.

This class is used by a [ShaderMaterial](ShaderMaterial.md) and allows you to write your own custom behavior for rendering visual items or updating particle information. For a detailed explanation and usage, please see the tutorials linked below.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Shaders documentation index](../tutorials/shaders/index.md)

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_Shader_Mode"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **Mode**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_Shader_Mode)

<a id="Shader_constant_MODE_SPATIAL"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Mode](Shader.md#enum_Shader_Mode) **MODE_SPATIAL** = `0`

Mode used to draw all 3D objects.<a id="Shader_constant_MODE_CANVAS_ITEM"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Mode](Shader.md#enum_Shader_Mode) **MODE_CANVAS_ITEM** = `1`

Mode used to draw all 2D objects.<a id="Shader_constant_MODE_PARTICLES"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Mode](Shader.md#enum_Shader_Mode) **MODE_PARTICLES** = `2`

Mode used to calculate particle information on a per-particle basis. Not used for drawing.<a id="Shader_constant_MODE_SKY"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Mode](Shader.md#enum_Shader_Mode) **MODE_SKY** = `3`

Mode used for drawing skies. Only works with shaders attached to [Sky](Sky.md) objects.<a id="Shader_constant_MODE_FOG"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Mode](Shader.md#enum_Shader_Mode) **MODE_FOG** = `4`

Mode used for setting the color and density of volumetric fog effect.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

## Property Descriptions

<a id="Shader_property_code"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **code** = `""` [ðŸ”—](#Shader_property_code)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_code**\ (\ value\: [String](String.md)\ )
- [String](String.md) **get_code**\ (\ )

Returns the shader's code as the user has written it, not the full generated code used internally.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="Shader_method_get_default_texture_parameter"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Texture](Texture.md) **get_default_texture_parameter**\ (\ name\: [StringName](StringName.md), index\: [int](int.md) = 0\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#Shader_method_get_default_texture_parameter)

Returns the texture that is set as default for the specified parameter.

\ **Note:** `name` must match the name of the uniform in the code exactly.

\ **Note:** If the sampler array is used use `index` to access the specified texture.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Shader_method_get_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Mode](Shader.md#enum_Shader_Mode) **get_mode**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#Shader_method_get_mode)

Returns the shader mode for the shader.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Shader_method_get_shader_uniform_list"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Array](Array.md) **get_shader_uniform_list**\ (\ get_groups\: [bool](bool.md) = false\ ) [ðŸ”—](#Shader_method_get_shader_uniform_list)

Returns the list of shader uniforms that can be assigned to a [ShaderMaterial](ShaderMaterial.md), for use with [ShaderMaterial.set_shader_parameter()](ShaderMaterial.md#ShaderMaterial_method_set_shader_parameter) and [ShaderMaterial.get_shader_parameter()](ShaderMaterial.md#ShaderMaterial_method_get_shader_parameter). The parameters returned are contained in dictionaries in a similar format to the ones returned by [Object.get_property_list()](Object.md#Object_method_get_property_list).

If argument `get_groups` is ``true``, parameter grouping hints are also included in the list.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Shader_method_inspect_native_shader_code"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **inspect_native_shader_code**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#Shader_method_inspect_native_shader_code)

Only available when running in the editor. Opens a popup that visualizes the generated shader code, including all variants and internal shader code. See also [Material.inspect_native_shader_code()](Material.md#Material_method_inspect_native_shader_code).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Shader_method_set_default_texture_parameter"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_default_texture_parameter**\ (\ name\: [StringName](StringName.md), texture\: [Texture](Texture.md), index\: [int](int.md) = 0\ ) [ðŸ”—](#Shader_method_set_default_texture_parameter)

Sets the default texture to be used with a texture uniform. The default is used if a texture is not set in the [ShaderMaterial](ShaderMaterial.md).

\ **Note:** `name` must match the name of the uniform in the code exactly.

\ **Note:** If the sampler array is used use `index` to access the specified texture.
